text.more:
The nodes show people.
The nodes can be further grouped by color. The color represents the kind of relation this person has with Guido Gezelle.
The edges show the relations between people.
The color represents a specific kind of relation.
text.intro:
This is a visualisation of the network of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata. 
The graph shows people who are connected to Guido Gezelle and to who Guido Gezelle is connected to on Wikidata.
text.title: Network of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata
